review: My Amazon Fire TV, gets plenty of use in the bedroom. I used this to replace the PS3 that was in the bedroom but finally died. I use the voice functionality which actually works (I am surprised because I have a London Accent and no voice control ever works).I use Plex to stream local media to the Fire TV, which works excellently and I never have an issue with.The Fire TV UI is sleek, quick and looks great on any size TV. (currently on a 55 inch TV) the Prime content is easy to access and 1-click purchases is a breeze.This has been my favorite streaming device so far, I have used Chromecast, PS4,PS3, Apple TV and my Vizio TV. This one is far the best i the market.
